Breeding adult.description: Ruddy Turnstones have bright orange legs and a uniquely patterned black-and-white face while Black Turnstones have dark legs and are blackish overall without patterning on the face.

Nonbreeding adult.description: Nonbreeding Ruddy Turnstones are browner than nonbreeding Black Turnstones with orange (not dark) legs.

Nonbreeding.description: Rock Sandpipers have longer legs and a longer slightly drooping bill than Black Turnstones. They are also gray overall while Black Turnstones have much darker plumage.
